thread.title: Grate boutique hotel!!!
thread.title_full: Grate boutique hotel!!! - Review of Dharma Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: ilanap69
title: Grate boutique hotel!!!
text:
This boutique hotel is just perfect for staying in Rome. We were upgraded and got the comfort room with shower. It was a tastefully decorated large room with comfortable bathroom. Very clean!!! the breakfast was excellent and the staff very helpful. I will certainly will stay there again.
Room Tip: ask for room 503 comfort room. See more room tips
